body:
Alright,

I asked for media rank a couple days back and Jozz said they were full on media ranks. Fair enough I agree with his decision BUT....

I am so confused why shadowolf got media rank like yesturday when I was told a week ago they were full? Am I not wanted at Media rank? I honestly may sound demanding but... can I have media rank? 

Oh please don't say "Message jozz on skype" because I already have and he's not accepting my contact request.


sooo PLEASE HELP ME

title: Media Rank [NEED HELP PLEASE READ]

replies.body: How about you take some initiative and ask him yourself?
replies.body_tagged: How about you take some initiative and ask him yourself?

replies.body: No, he's right. You can actually ask jozz about receiving the rank, that's all there is to it.
replies.body_tagged: No, he's right. You can actually ask jozz about receiving the rank, that's all there is to it.

replies.body: Eh. Assuming the guy asking is a regular and has the means of asking jozzlez, I have no argument there. But I am disgruntled that the reply from a staff member is 'ask jozz' and not 'hey, I'll let jozz know you're interested'. Its all about taking initiative.

reply_to.body: If I livestream will I get it?
reply_to.body_tagged: If I livestream will I get it?

replies.body:
Well it depends on what your internet is like whats the speed of it particularly your upload speed. I just skim the iceberg I can just run fine on good quality on my live stream.

Also depends on how good your content will be will you be streaming with friends? Or with the people on the public TeamSpeak?

It really depends on your:
- Internet Bandwidth
- Content
- Quality

Just some words of wisdom from Mr shadowolf! Have a great Night!
